subject: Football
DNA (Deoxyribonucleic Acid)
Suits and Litigation
lead_paragraph: Relatives of the Notre Dame football great George Gipp filed suit Friday against ESPN, among other parties, over the exhumation of Gipp’s remains.
snippet: Relatives of the Notre Dame football great George Gipp filed suit Friday against ESPN, among other parties, over the exhumation of Gipp’s remains.
